subject: 15pack special, Resellers making >$1mil/year, new client video, and more

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Fellow agency partners,

Below you will find some new agency partner assets, some updates, and a reminder regarding our 15pack special (available until July 1st).

If you have any questions at all, please reply to this email, thanks!

- Team Termageddon

Agency partner news and updates:

🎉 Agency resellers are generating over $1,000,000/year in recurring revenue!

We were recently reviewing our reseller program to understand how our active agency partners are doing. We were thrilled to find out that, when combined, our agency partner resellers are generating more than $1,000,000 per year in additional recurring revenue! This was, to say the least, such an honor to see. Thank you all for your support and we're so happy to see partners are able to generate an additional recurring revenue stream for their business while helping clients get protected with a strategy to keeping policies up to date!

It seems like the most successful reselling method is to simply have clients sign the website policies waiver right before site launch (most agencies report 75%+ of new clients select the option to sign up with Termageddon). Getting the waiver signed is a great way to protect your agency, even if a client selects to not have policies. It's a good, non-salesy way to educate clients and let them decide what they want to do for their own website and business (while protecting your own business!).

New video you can embed onto your website!

We have a new video for our agency partners, which explains the benefits of Termageddon and ends the video with saying to 'ask your web developer how you can get started today with Termageddon'.

Access the video:
Embeddable Vimeo link
Downloadable video link
Transcript

We hope you like it!

SPECIAL 15pack OFFER: [+$1,800/year more recurring revenue]
In lieu of our pricing change (see previous email or click here for more info), between now and July 1, 2023, we are releasing the 15pack special for all agency partners:
  • $299/year for 15 licenses - price locked in for 2 more years.
  • Price does not change until 2025 ($328.90/yr after).
  • Resell each license at $120/yr (+ a recommended $100-$200 setup fee)
  • Cover your cost with just three clients signing up (most agencies report 80% or more of new clients signing up with Termageddon when they sign the website policies waiver prior to site launch).
  • Free swag item from shop.termageddon.com

The 15pack is now available in your Termageddon account (under "Hello" -> "Billing" -> "Buy" -> "Buy in Bulk"). New orders/clients only; this deal can not be used for previous client license purchases.

New, smaller cookie consent layout

We released a new layout option for the Usercentrics cookie consent banner. Feel free to check it out at termageddon.com in incognito mode. If you like what you see, you can make this change for your own website by going to the questionnaire for the Cookie Policy and Consent Tool. On page 1, select 'bottom left' layout, and on page 3, select 'x' instead of 'continue without accepting'. Then click 'next', 'next',... 'submit' and the changes will take immediate effect on your website (you do not need to re-embed the codes).

WordPress Plugin update - improved "Privacy Settings" link embedding

Yesterday, we released an update to our WordPress plugin which allows you to more easily embed the "Privacy Settings" hyperlink into website footers. This is now available in the "Settings" area of the plugin and helps resolve the issue where some themes auto-change the default Privacy Settings embed code causing it to break.

Want to help us? Take a 1 minute survey (max 4 questions)

We're hoping to get some feedback from partners today regarding their use (or non-use) of the website policies waiver. We'd greatly appreciate your honest feedback (and we aren't judging!). If you're open to giving us a minute of your time, please fill out this form.

Answer quick survey

If you have received this email by mistake, you must delete this email immediately from your system.
